title: Sok Sabai – Mental Health App Concept
description: Created a concept for a mental health support app during the INCiTE Summer School in Cambodia, focusing on student wellbeing and accessibility. Designed visuals and app layout using Canva.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Developed a responsive personal portfolio using React, Vite, and CSS Modules to showcase my projects, experience, and contact information. The site is designed for both desktop and mobile and deployed using Netlify.

title: SEPP Coursework – FAQ & Inquiry System
description: Developed a Java-based system for managing FAQs and inquiries as part of a Software Engineering Practical Project (SEPP) coursework at university.
